General.Name: Bond Resources Inc
General.Description: Bond Resources Inc. engages in the exploration of mineral properties. The company holds interest in the Mary K prospect located in Elk City Mining District, Idaho County. It also holds 100% interests in the Aspen property claim block covering an area of 1,292 hectares located in Nechako Plateau in British Columbia; and the Hard Cash property covering an area of 166 acres located in Montana, the United States. The company was formerly known as J. Bond Capital Corporation and changed its name to Bond Resources Inc. in November 2018. Bond Resources Inc. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6

1.Name: Mr. Gary Vittorio Arca CPA, CA
